meanings.definition: A type of Mexican or Spanish cake or pie
meanings.sent1: Maria baked a delicious torta for her friend's birthday party.
meanings.sent2: In Mexico, it is common to enjoy a slice of torta with coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The torta was so big, it took two people to carry it to the table!
meanings.sent4: The torta looked like a colorful work of art with its layers of frosting and fruit.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the torta filled the room, making everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of Italian sandwich made with flatbread
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious torta filled with ham and cheese for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The local deli makes the best tortas in town, always fresh and tasty.
meanings.sent3: As I bit into the torta, the flavors exploded in my mouth, a delightful surprise!
meanings.sent4: The torta was so big, it reminded me of a small pizza folded in half.
meanings.sent5: The torta was a satisfying meal, perfect for a quick bite on a busy day.

meanings.definition: A type of Mexican or Spanish omelette made with eggs and potatoes
meanings.sent1: For breakfast, I enjoyed a flavorful torta with eggs and potatoes.
meanings.sent2: The torta was a hearty dish, perfect for starting the day with energy.
meanings.sent3: When Maria flipped the torta in the pan, it landed perfectly back on the plate!
meanings.sent4: The torta was like a fluffy cloud of eggs and potatoes, a comforting meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling torta filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
